about:
I’m a frontend software developer, passionate about solving problems with code and transforming ideas from pixels to scalable products. I create usable applications with user experience as a top priority using various web tools, languages and technology.
 I also recently started working on open source project by giving back to the community, the best way to get better at any activity is by constantly do it. I love collaborating with other developers and sharing ideas on how to go about an issue

timelines.jobDescription: I’m currently building smart solutions for the gaming and gambling industry with the team here at Betawave labs

jobDuties.description: Crafted a component library from scratch using SCSS Modules to ensure consistency.
Used Nuxt Js to deliver optimised, pre-rendered pages when necessary
Engineered state management with Vuex and Pinia.
Pulled data from the feeds provider in real time to display live statistics and event odds.
Maintained a well structured codebase and used Typescript to improve predictability.
Integrated Payment gateway providers
Implemented Api request caching on the server to save resources, improve performance and generally reduce load on the backend.

timelines.jobDescription: Helped the team build an inventory for medical staffs, and patient. We were customers could book appointment, get electronic copies of their prescriptions.

jobDuties.description: Worked with software development and testing team members to design and develop robust solutions to meet client requirements for functionality, scalability and performance.
Reviewed project specifications and designed technology solutions that met or exceeded performance expectations.
Tested methodology with writing and execution of test plans, debugging and testing scripts and tools.
Collaborated with management, internal and development partners regarding software application design status and project progress.
Provided guidance and mentored less-experienced staff members.

timelines.jobDescription: I’m currently building smart solutions on the decentralised web with the team at Caketools labs

jobDuties.description: Introduced agile methodologies and development best practices to division to enhance product development.
Pioneered new methods of code review to incorporate wider range of voices.
Shipped new featured into the existing project.
Designed intuitive graphical user interfaces for the bet acceptance system.

timelines.jobDescription: I worked on building landing pages and horning my software development skills.

jobDuties.description: Revised, modularized and updated old code bases to modern development standards, reducing operating costs and improving functionality.
Collaborated with project managers to select ambitious, but realistic coding milestones on pre- release software project development.
Performed regression and system-level testing to verify software quality and function prior to release.
Delivered and maintained scalable system architecture to support high-availability Internet site with various internal applications.
Coordinated with project management staff on database development timelines and project scope.
Collaborated on all stages of systems development lifecycle, from requirement gathering to production releases.

education.title: Education
education.jobDescription: I graduated with a Upper Second Class Honors.

jobDuties.description: Member of Society of petroleum engineer's, Top 12% of Class.
Elected as Course representative for the department.
Member of Society of petroleum engineers.

Member of Society of petroleum engineers. (SPE)
